replies.author: naruro2010
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 naruro2010 于 2014-1-20 15:21 编辑 

改建筑权利
要打开伺服器里的文件 plugins/GroupManager/worlds/groups
groups要使用Notepad++打开
  Default:
    default: true
    permissions:
    - -bukkit.command.kill
    - quickshop.create.buy
    - quickshop.create.sell
    - quickshop.use
    inheritance:
    - g:groupmanager_default
    - g:bukkit_default
    - g:essentials_default
    - g:towny_default
    info:
      prefix: '&a'
      build: true
      suffix: ''
把build:的false改true

replies.author: Forsworn_
replies.txt_content:
/manuadd 名字 权限组 
= = 貌似是

replies.author: wjwrh
replies.txt_content: /manuaddp default 权限  用此命令给你的游客权限组添加权限吧.
